DOC.brief_summary: This single dose , open-label , randomize , crossover study subject severe Hemophilia A compare bioavailability 2 different strength Kogenate FS ( BAY 14-2222 ) .
DOC.brief_title: Comparative Pharmacokinetic Study Two Different Strengths BAY14-2222
DOC.criteria: Males , age 18 65 year Subjects Severe hemophilia A documented plasma FVIII level < 1 % > /= 150 ED ( exposure day ) FVIII concentrate ( ) support medical record Evidence current past inhibitor antibody History congenital acquire coagulation disorder hemophilia A Platelet count < 75,000/mm3 Abnormal renal function ( serum creatinine > 2 time upper limit normal range ) Active liver disease verify medical history persistently elevate alanine aminotransferase ( ALT ) aspartate aminotransferase ( AST ) > 5x upper limit normal severe liver disease evidence , limit following : International Normalized Ratio ( INR ) > 1.4 , hypoalbuminemia , portal vein hypertension include presence otherwise unexplained splenomegaly history esophageal varix
